summary: Days of Eclipse is filmed in a psychedelic manner close to stream of consciousness using unusual cinematographic techniques. The action is set in Middle Asia.
cast: Aleksei Ananishnov|Eskender Umarov|Irina Sokolova|Vladimir Zamanskiy|Kirill Dudkin|Aleksey Yankovskiy|Viktor Belovolskiy|Sergei Krylov
